data.name: Modern FPS War Shooting Game
data.description:
The Modern FPS War is an action-packed, first-person shooter game set on a modern battlefield. The fps shooting war game offers you the most realistic and underworld war missions. Desert gangster crime mafia is ruling over the desert, and you are part of this real modern fps shooting war.
A player assumes the role of a soldier with rifles, shotguns, and pistols, suitable for different missions, and brings peace to the desert by fighting against desert gangsters. Offline fps shooting games offer you incredible guns similar to multi-world fps shooting games.
AI is at its peak in this war shooting game, making this fps game a masterpiece.
KEY FEATURES:
- Most realistic shooting mission against desert underworld gang mafia.
- A FPS action modern shooting game.
- Offline & Free Realistic Shooting assassination missions.
- Deadly weapons.
 - Addictive gameplay.
- Good quality sound effects and realistic 3d graphics.
- Simple and smooth shooting control with a huge range of weapons.
